profile_positions.company: SCA - Hygiene and Forest Products Company
profile_positions.description:
Paper Mill and distribution center on site. Production is approximately 60,000 tons of paper from two paper machines and this paper is converted into internationally branded products. This job was process intensive and controlling processes was essential to efficient production. SCA uses the SAP factory package and SAP business warehouse.  I ensured that all financial entries were in accordance to IFRS. Furthermore, I guarded process integrity to ensure accurate production reporting. In addition, I tracked monthly results with actual to budget analyses and variance breakdowns. I produced budgets, rolling forecasts, product cost price calculations, and product segment analyses. The site also has multiple million euro CAPEX projects active at any given time requiring constant financial oversight and control. I ensured that monthly KPI reporting matrices were reported on time and accurate. I verified that all monthly product reconciliations between the paper mill and the IDC (independent distribution centre)  were accurate. I approved product invoicing between the mill and the IDC, and verified invoicing between the IDC and market organizations. I was a member of the site leadership team, and the financial sparring partner to the mill manager. I lead a team of 3 controllers. 

Main Experience

• Financial Responsible for Manufacturing Facility & Distribution Center
• Monitored manufacturing processes for optimal efficiency and reported monthly variance
• Produced bottom-up budgets and rolling forecasts
• Produced product cost prices based on activity-based costing
• Point person for financial integration into new SCA organizational structure
• Member of site management team and manager of controlling team (3 controllers)

Achievements

• Successful in integrating financial processes into new company reporting structure.
• Revised product cost price methodologies to come in line with market expectations.
• Implemented KPI reporting structure.
